title: Client bugged. Cant change/select masteries - problems with lobby
body:
Have had mastery/rune problems since the start of pre season, and the lobby issues have been going on for the last day. Just curious if riot is working on the problems, and how things could have gone so wrong so quickly?

I cant change my runes/masteries in champ select or make a new page, I also spent ~15 minutes just trying to invite my friends into the same lobby as me, then another ~15 trying to get into the game.
